column4: nah  think you missunderstood i have no clue where to install the file to and the file does not know either. so if you could tell me where about in the filesystem the printerdata is installed that would help me. i think
why are you building this from source?  Is there no official/unofficial packages you could install from for you're printer?
ah, then it's up to 'you' to decide where everything is put, thats what the 'make install' will do for you.  make sure you're familiar with 'make' procedures
